additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate/Sodium C12-13 Pareth Sulfate*, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Dimethiconol, Pearl Extract, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycerin, Peg-45M, Carbomer, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Tea-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Tea-Sulfate, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Mica, Tin Oxide, Silica, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, Ci 77891. *Used Interchangeably

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Caution: Use Only As Directed. Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Eye Contact Occurs, Immediately Rinse With Water. If Rash Or Irritation Occurs, Discontinue Use.
